mapper.select: SELECT review_comment_id, trip_review_id, parent_review_comment_id, user_id, content, created_at, username, profile FROM review_comment JOIN user USING(user_id) WHERE parent_review_comment_id IS NULL AND trip_review_id = #{tripReviewId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size};
